entry.title: Short hint for all those who use vim and pathogen
entry.content: Today, after updating my wokspace to latest version I encounter below error during vim running: Error detected while processing function pathogen#runtime_append_all_bundles: line 1: E121: Undefined variable: source_path E116: Invalid arguments for function string(source_path).') to pathogen#incubate('.string(source_path.'/{}').')') E116: Invalid arguments for function 4_warn Press ENTER or type command to continue Quick look on pathogen runtime_append_all_bundles function and I found: bash call s:warn('Change pathogen#runtime_append_all_bundles('.string(a:1).') to pathogen#incubate('.string(a:1.'/{}').')') So simply replacing: bash call pathogen#runtime_append_all_bundles() with: bash call pathogen#incubate() in $HOME/.vimrc fix the problem.
